definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: guard, watch, also charge, function;—´[[מ]]: abs. 2Sa 20:3 +, cstr. 2Ki 11:5 +; abs. [[מִשְׁמָָרֶת]] Ex 16:34; sf. [[מִשְׁמַרְתִּי]] Ge 26:5 +, etc.; pl. [[מִשְׁמָרוֹת]] 1Ch 9:23 +; cstr. [[מִשְׁמְרוֹת]] Ne 7:3; sf. [[רוֹתָם]]- 2Ch 7:6 +, [[תֵיהֶם]]- 2Ch 31:17;—†

guard, watch: ´[[בֵּית מ]]: 2Sa 20:3 = house of detention, confinement; [[אַתָּה עִמָּדִי]] ´[[מ]]: 1Sa 22:23 i.e. protected, secure; c. [[שָׁמַר]] keep the watch 2Ki 11:5, 2Ki 11:6, 2Ki 11:7, 1Ch 12:30 (van d. H. v:29); = post of watch (fig.) Is 21:3 (‖[[מִחְפֶה ]]), Hb Hab 2:1 (‖[[מָחוֹר ]]); pl. = guards Ne 7:3, 1Ch 9:23. †
keeping, preserving, ´[[וְהָיָה לָכֶם לְמ]]: Ex 12:6 i.e. ye shall keep it; ´[[הִנִּיחוּ לָכֶם לְמ]]: Ex 16:23, cf. v:Ex 16:32, v:Ex 16:33, v:Ex 16:34, Nu 19:9 (all P). †

charge, injunction of ´[[י]]:, c. [[שָׁמַר]], in gen. De 11:1 ( + [[חֻקוֹת]], [[מִשְׁפָּטִים]], [[מִחְוֹת]]), cf. Ge 26:5, 1Ki 2:3, and (´[[מִחְוַת י]] :´[[מ]]:) Jos 22:3 (all R:D), Mal 3:14; of specif. injunctions Le 18:30, Nu 9:19, Nu 9:23. †

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: ceremonial office or function (AV RV usu. charge) of priest or Levite (P [esp. Nu], Ez Eze 40, Eze 44, Eze 48, Chr Zc), mostly c. [[שָׁמַר]]: [[מִשְׁכַּן הָלֵדוּת]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 1:53, ´[[מִשְׁכַּן י]] :´[[מ]]: Nu 31:30, Nu 31:47, [[הַמִּקְדָּשׁ]] ´[[מ]]: Ez Eze 44:15, Nu 3:38, [[אׂהֶל מוֹעֵד]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 18:4 cf. v:Nu 18:3, 1Ch 23:32, [[הַקּׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 3:28, Nu 3:32, Nu 18:5, 1Ch 23:32, [[קָדָשַׁי]] ´[[מ]]: (of Isr. in gen.) Ez Eze 44:8, [[הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 18:5, Ez Eze 40:46, [[תְּרוּמׂתָָי]] Nu 18:8, [[הַבַּיִת]] ´[[מ]]: Ez Eze 40:45, Eze 44:14, [[הַטָּהֳרָה]] ´[[מ]]: Ne 12:45; c. genit. (sf.) ´[[מ]] :´[[שׁ]]: = perform the service imposed by, due to, Le 8:35, Le 22:9, Ez Eze 44:8, Eze 44:16, Eze 48:11, Zec 3:7, [[אֱעלהֵיהֶם]] ´[[מ]]: Ne 12:45 (of Judah in gen.); [[הָעֵדָה]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 3:7 a, ´[[בְּנֵי יִשׂ]] :´[[מ]]: Nu 3:8, Nu 3:38, [[בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 3:25, cf. v:Nu 3:7 a, v:Nu 3:31, v:Nu 3:36, Nu 4:27, Nu 4:28, Nu 4:31, Nu 4:32, Nu 18:3, 1Ch 23:32; also, in secular sense, [[בֵּית שָׁאוּל]] ´[[מ]]: 1Ch 12:30; [[מַשָּׂאָם]] ´[[מ]]: Nu 4:31, [[מַשָּׂאָם]] ´[[כְּלֵי מ]]: v:Nu 4:32 (v:Nu 4:27 read c. LXX Di Gr Gray, etc. [[בְּשֵׁמוֹת]] for ´[[במ]]:, and perhaps [[מִשְׁמֶרֶת]] after [[אֵת]], cf. v:Nu 4:32); ´[[עֲלֵיהֶם מ]]: 1Ch 9:27 i.e. the duty rested upon them;—1Ch 25:8, 1Ch 26:12, v. 1. [[עֻמָה]]

definitions.title: c, d
definitions.body: (p. 769 supr.); [[עׂמְדִים]] ´[[עַל־מ]]: 2Ch 7:6 were standing according to (or in) their offices, ´[[הֱעֶמִיד עַל מ]]: appoint to their offices 2Ch 8:14, 2Ch 35:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: pl. of Levitical divisions for service Ne 12:9.
